ygData.subject: Re: Gimmee Gimmee!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hey, Harmonic!  I hear you have some Lambent Bracers?  (I didn t say I didn t do it with my *primary* character, did I?) Kenross  ;=)
ygData.messageBody:
Ken Bachman wrote:
>
> When I play my lower level characters, I will /yell if in trouble, I will
> flirt, I will give assistance, I will /moan if injured, but I will
> *never* ask another player for money or items. That just seems really
> crass to me, and I don't think it should be rewarded (unless the player
> is particularly amusing about it, which happens...)
>
> Kenross Cantoforjado, 42 songs, Innoruuk

Hey, Harmonic! I hear you have some Lambent Bracers? (I didn't say I
didn't do it with my *primary* character, did I?)

Kenross ;=)
